project.name: Omiga
project.desc: A decentralized inscription protocol on CKB, empowering fair minting and management of digital assets like MEMES, fueling cross-chain innovation and boosting Nervos Network's ecosystem.

project.name: UTXO Swap
project.desc: UTXO Swap is a decentralized exchange built on Nervos CKB Layer 2, designed for seamless, intent-driven trading, leveraging CKB Extended UTXO model and cross-chain bridging for secure, efficient swaps with minimal trust requirements.

project.name: imagiNation
project.desc: ImagiNation is a decentralized marketplace on Nervos CKB, enabling fully on-chain asset creation, trading, and value capture, with plans to support RGB++ for Bitcoin-compatible smart contracts and asset issuance.

sparkGranted.name: Quantum Purse
sparkGranted.desc: A pioneering anti-quantum wallet developed on the CKB blockchain

highlighted.name: Stable++
highlighted.desc: A decentralized stablecoin protocol on CKB, crafts BUSD through over-collateralized BTC assets, enhancing stability and liquidity across the Bitcoin and RGB++ ecosystems.

highlighted.name: HueHub
highlighted.desc: A decentralized exchange on CKB, empowers seamless trading and fair issuance of Omni-assets, enhancing Bitcoin's functionality and enriching Nervos Network's vibrant ecosystem.

highlighted.name: Philosopher's Stone
highlighted.desc: An enigmatic protocol on CKB, transmutes the blockchain into a crucible of boundless transformation, where its alchemical essence empowers users to conjure unique digital artifacts.

premium.name: JoyID
premium.desc: A luminous thread in the CKB tapestry, weaves a decentralized identity realm where users wield sovereign control over their digital essence across blockchain's boundless stage. Its elegant fusion of passkey authentication and cross-chain sensory perception empowers users.

premium.name: Nervape
premium.desc: A vibrant digital realm on the CKB blockchain, offers an extraordinary haven where creators conjure and trade digital treasures across chains, igniting a seamless alchemy of cross-chain artistry amidst CKB's ecosystem, creating a constellation of developers and artists in a harmonious digital tapestry.

premium.name: JoyGift
premium.desc: A heartfelt melody on the CKB blockchain, orchestrates a digital red envelope tradition, where users craft and share personalized token-filled tales.

premium.name: DotBit
premium.desc: A decentralized identity protocol on CKB, weaves a cross-chain tapestry of domain, user-friendly addresses, and secure management of digital identity and asset management across blockchains.

premium.name: NervDao
premium.desc: NervDao is a dApp on Nervos CKB, streamlining Nervos DAO interaction. It supports wallets like MetaMask and JoyID for easy CKB deposits/withdrawals, offering rewards and dilution protection. Features include auto-compounded rewards, a one-month lockup, and plans for UI upgrades and NFT credentials.

community.name: iCKB (@Phroi)
community.desc: iCKB offers liquid staking tokens for Nervos DAO, enabling instant CKB-to-iCKB conversions and withdrawals without the 30-day lockup.
